name: Brussels Office of the Swedish Trade Unions
membership:
The Swedish Trade Union Confederations are members of:
the European Trade Union Confederation (ETUC, www.etuc.org), the Council of Nordic Trade Unions (NFS, www.nfs.net) and the International Trade Union Confederation (ITUC, www.ituc-csi.org).
goal: The aim of the Brussels Office of the Swedish Trade Unions is to support the work of the national central confederations and their affiliates in relation to promoting European integration.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Mainly following issues: Employment and Social Affairs, Internal Market, Industry and Research, Legal Affairs and Constitutional Affairs.
